text: You can use HubL to rewrite the value. It will work.

Hi there.  I’d like to create an email template that with a link that is generated via an API call and unique per Deal.  I can think of two options, are there others?
1. Custom UI to get the link, then manually copy/paste in to the email.
2. Webhook that listens a property change on a Deal; it would generate the link and pass it to  `v3/emails/send`   
TIA!
You can use api to set the link on a custom deal property, which will trigger a workflow with that email template where you can use the custom deal property that has the link
